00015 Vehicle::Vehicle(GameWorld* world,
00016                  ngl::Vec3 position,
00017                  ngl::Vec3 velocity,
00018                  float rotation,
00019                  float mass,
00020                  float max_force,
00021                  float max_speed,
00022                  float max_turnrate,
00023                  float scale): MovingEntity(world,
00024                                             position,
00025                                             scale,
00026                                             velocity,
00027                                             max_speed,
00028                                             ngl::Vec3(sin(rotation),0,-cos(rotation)),
00029                                             mass,
00030                                             max_turnrate,
00031                                             max_force),
00032                                 m_timeElapsed(0.0)
00033 {
00034   m_steering =  new SteeringBehaviour(this);
00035   m_nextSlot = 0;
00036   m_smoothingOn = true;
00037   m_sampleSize = 25.0;
00038   m_pathIndex = 0;
00039   m_crosshair= ngl::Vec3(0,0,0);
00040   m_squadCrosshair = ngl::Vec3(0,0,0);
00041 
00042   for(int i =0; i<m_sampleSize; i++)
00043   {
00044     ngl::Vec3 zeroValue = ngl::Vec3(0,0,0);
00045     m_headingHistory.push_back(zeroValue);
00046   }
00047 }

00060 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 void Vehicle::update(double time_elapsed)
00062 {
00063   m_timeElapsed = time_elapsed;
00064 
00065   ngl::Vec3 SteeringForce;
00066   SteeringForce = m_steering->calculatePrioritizedSum();
00067 
00068   ngl::Vec3 acceleration = SteeringForce / m_mass;
00069   m_velocity += acceleration * time_elapsed;
00070 
00071   //velocity truncated by maxspeed
00072 
00073 
00074   if(m_velocity.lengthSquared() > m_maxSpeed * m_maxSpeed)
00075   {
00076     if(m_velocity.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00077     {
00078       std::cout<<"Velocity in vehicle update equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082       m_velocity.normalize();
00083     }
00084    m_velocity = m_velocity * m_maxSpeed;
00085   }
00086 
00087   m_pos += m_velocity * time_elapsed;
00088 
00089   if(m_velocity.lengthSquared()>0.000000001)
00090   {
00091     ngl::Vec3 tempVel;
00092     tempVel = m_velocity;
00093 
00094     if(tempVel.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00095     {
00096       std::cout<<"tempVel in vehicle update equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00097     }
00098     else
00099     {
00100       tempVel.normalize();
00101     }
00102 
00103     m_heading = tempVel;
00104 
00105     m_side = m_heading.cross(ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
00106   }
00107 
00108   //smooth the vehicles heading
00109   if(m_smoothingOn == true);
00110   {
00111     m_smoothHeading = smoothingUpdate(getHeading());
00112     m_heading = m_smoothHeading;
00113   }
00114 
00115   // if the path has been set, set the vehicle to follow it
00116   if(m_path.size() != 0)
00117   {
00118     this->followPath();
00119   }
00120 
00121 }

00129 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132 ngl::Vec3 Vehicle::smoothingUpdate(ngl::Vec3 _recentHeading)
00133 {
00134   m_headingHistory[m_nextSlot++] = _recentHeading;
00135 
00136   if(m_nextSlot == m_headingHistory.size())
00137   {
00138     m_nextSlot = 0;
00139   }
00140 
00141   ngl::Vec3 sum = ngl::Vec3(0,0,0);
00142   std::vector<ngl::Vec3>::iterator it = m_headingHistory.begin();
00143 
00144   for(it; it!=m_headingHistory.end(); it++)
00145   {
00146     sum += *it;
00147   }
00148 
00149   return sum / m_headingHistory.size();
00150 }

00152 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00156 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00157 ngl::Vec3 Vehicle::findNearestExit(std::vector<ngl::Vec3> _exits)
00158 {
00159   //find nearest point to current positiong and set that as path thing
00160 
00161   ngl::Vec3 bestExit;
00162   float dist = 1000000000.0;
00163   int exitSize = _exits.size();
00164   for(int i = 0; i<exitSize; i++)
00165   {
00166     ngl::Vec3 currentExit = _exits[i];
00167     float testDist = (currentExit- this->getPos()).lengthSquared();
00168     if(testDist < dist*dist)
00169     {
00170       bestExit = currentExit;
00171       dist = testDist;
00172     }
00173   }
00174   return bestExit;
00175 }

00177 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00179 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00180 void Vehicle::findPath(ngl::Vec3 _target)
00181 {
00182   m_path.clear();
00183   m_pathIndex =0;
00184   std::vector<ngl::Vec3> path;
00185   path = m_world->getCellGraph()->findPath(this, _target);
00186   m_path = path;
00187   m_crosshair = m_path[m_pathIndex];
00188 }
00189 
00190 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00194 void Vehicle::followPath()
00195 {
00196   //go through each vec3 and set as crosshair to follow the path
00197 
00198   if (m_pathIndex != m_path.size()-1 && (this->getPos() - m_path[m_pathIndex]).lengthSquared()<= 9)
00199   {
00200     setPathIndex(m_pathIndex += 1);
00201     m_crosshair = m_path[m_pathIndex];
00202   }
00203   if(m_pathIndex == m_path.size()-1)
00204   {
00205     m_path.clear();
00206     m_pathIndex =0;
00207   }
00208 }
